verses.verse: Then we turned, <S%H6437><s%> and took our journey <S%H5265><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me: and we compassed <S%H5437><s%> <S%H853><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>
Ye have compassed <S%H5437><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> long enough: <S%H7227><s%> turn <S%H6437><s%> you northward. <S%H6828><s%>

And command <S%H6680><s%> thou the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Ye <S%H859><s%> are to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the coast <S%H1366><s%> of your brethren <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Seir; <S%H8165><s%> and they shall be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> you: take ye good heed unto yourselves therefore: <S%H8104><s%> <S%H3966><s%>

Meddle <S%H1624><s%> not <S%H408><s%> with them; for <S%H3588><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> you of their land, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> no, not so much <S%H5704><s%> as a foot breadth; <S%H4096><s%> <S%H3709><s%> <S%H7272><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> unto Esau <S%H6215><s%> for a possession. <S%H3425><s%>

Ye shall buy <S%H7666><s%> meat <S%H400><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> them for money, <S%H3701><s%> that ye may eat; <S%H398><s%> and ye shall also <S%H1571><s%> buy <S%H3739><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> them for money, <S%H3701><s%> that ye may drink. <S%H8354><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> thee in all <S%H3605><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of thy hand: <S%H3027><s%> he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> thy walking through <S%H1980><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath been with <S%H5973><s%> thee; thou hast lacked <S%H2637><s%> nothing. <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1697><s%>

And when we passed by <S%H5674><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> our brethren <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> through the way <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> of the plain <S%H6160><s%> from Elath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H359><s%> and from Ezion-gaber, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6100><s%> we turned <S%H6437><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Distress <S%H6696><s%> not <S%H408><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Moabites, <S%H4124><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> contend <S%H1624><s%> with them in battle: <S%H4421><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> thee of their land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> for a possession; <S%H3425><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> for a possession. <S%H3425><s%>

The Emims <S%H368><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> therein in times past, <S%H6440><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> great, <S%H1419><s%> and many, <S%H7227><s%> and tall, <S%H7311><s%> as the Anakims; <S%H6062><s%>
Which <S%H1992><s%> also <S%H637><s%> were accounted <S%H2803><s%> giants, <S%H7497><s%> as the Anakims; <S%H6062><s%> but the Moabites <S%H4125><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> them Emims. <S%H368><s%>

The Horims <S%H2752><s%> also dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Seir <S%H8165><s%> formerly; <S%H6440><s%> but the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> succeeded <S%H3423><s%> them, when they had destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in their stead; <S%H8478><s%> as <S%H834><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of his possession, <S%H3425><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto them.

Now <S%H6258><s%> rise up, <S%H6965><s%> said I, and get you over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered. <S%H2218><s%> And we went over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered. <S%H2218><s%>

And the space <S%H3117><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> we came <S%H1980><s%> from Kadesh-barnea, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6947><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> we were come over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered, <S%H2218><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the generation <S%H1755><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> were wasted <S%H8552><s%> out from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> the host, <S%H4264><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto them.

For indeed <S%H1571><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> against them, to destroy <S%H2000><s%> them from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> the host, <S%H4264><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they were consumed. <S%H8552><s%>

So it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> were consumed <S%H8552><s%> and dead <S%H4191><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%>
That the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>
Thou <S%H859><s%> art to pass over <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H853><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> <S%H853><s%> the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> this day: <S%H3117><s%>

And when thou comest nigh <S%H7126><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> distress <S%H6696><s%> them not, <S%H408><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> meddle <S%H1624><s%> with them: for <S%H3588><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> thee of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> any possession; <S%H3425><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> it unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> for a possession. <S%H3425><s%>

( That <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H637><s%> was accounted <S%H2803><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of giants: <S%H7497><s%> giants <S%H7497><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> therein in old time; <S%H6440><s%> and the Ammonites <S%H5984><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> them Zamzummims; <S%H2157><s%>

A people <S%H5971><s%> great, <S%H1419><s%> and many, <S%H7227><s%> and tall, <S%H7311><s%> as the Anakims; <S%H6062><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them; and they succeeded <S%H3423><s%> them, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in their stead: <S%H8478><s%>

As <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> when <S%H834><s%> he destroyed <S%H8045><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Horims <S%H2752><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them; and they succeeded <S%H3423><s%> them, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in their stead <S%H8478><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%>

And the Avims <S%H5757><s%> which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Hazerim, <S%H2699><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> Azzah, <S%H5804><s%> the Caphtorims, <S%H3732><s%> which came forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Caphtor, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3731><s%> destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in their stead.) <S%H8478><s%>

Rise ye up, <S%H6965><s%> take your journey, <S%H5265><s%> and pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon: <S%H769><s%> behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> into thine hand <S%H3027><s%> <S%H853><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and his land: <S%H776><s%> begin <S%H2490><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, and contend <S%H1624><s%> with him in battle. <S%H4421><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> will I begin <S%H2490><s%> to put <S%H5414><s%> the dread <S%H6343><s%> of thee and the fear <S%H3374><s%> of thee upon <S%H5921><s%> the nations <S%H5971><s%> that are under <S%H8478><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> who <S%H834><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> report <S%H8088><s%> of thee, and shall tremble, <S%H7264><s%> and be in anguish <S%H2342><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of thee.

And I sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> out of the wilderness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4057><s%> of Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with words <S%H1697><s%> of peace, <S%H7965><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Let me pass <S%H5674><s%> through thy land: <S%H776><s%> I will go <S%H1980><s%> along by the highway, <S%H1870><s%> <S%H1870><s%> I will neither <S%H3808><s%> turn <S%H5493><s%> unto the right hand <S%H3225><s%> nor to the left. <S%H8040><s%>

Thou shalt sell <S%H7666><s%> me meat <S%H400><s%> for money, <S%H3701><s%> that I may eat; <S%H398><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> me water <S%H4325><s%> for money, <S%H3701><s%> that I may drink: <S%H8354><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> I will pass through <S%H5674><s%> on my feet; <S%H7272><s%>

(As <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> and the Moabites <S%H4125><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Ar, <S%H6144><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> unto me;) until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> I shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> us.

But Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> let us pass <S%H5674><s%> by him: for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hardened <S%H7185><s%> <S%H853><s%> his spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and made his heart obstinate, <S%H553><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3824><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> he might deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into thy hand, <S%H3027><s%> as appeareth this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have begun <S%H2490><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and his land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee: begin <S%H2490><s%> to possess, <S%H3423><s%> that thou mayest inherit <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> his land. <S%H776><s%>
Then Sihon <S%H5511><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> us, he <S%H1931><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> to fight <S%H4421><s%> at Jahaz. <S%H3096><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> us; and we smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> him, and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>

And we took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his cities <S%H5892><s%> at that <S%H1931><s%> time, <S%H6256><s%> and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> the men, <S%H4962><s%> and the women, <S%H802><s%> and the little ones, <S%H2945><s%> <S%H853><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> we left <S%H7604><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> to remain: <S%H8300><s%>
Only <S%H7535><s%> the cattle <S%H929><s%> we took for a prey <S%H962><s%> unto ourselves, and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we took. <S%H3920><s%>

From <S%H4480><s%> Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H5921><s%> the brink <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> of Arnon, <S%H769><s%> and from the city <S%H5892><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is by the river, <S%H5158><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> there was <S%H1961><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> one city <S%H7151><s%> too strong <S%H7682><s%> for <S%H4480><s%> us: the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> unto <S%H6440><s%> us:

Only <S%H7535><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> thou camest <S%H7126><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> nor unto any <S%H3605><s%> place <S%H3027><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> nor unto the cities <S%H5892><s%> in the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> nor unto whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> forbade <S%H6680><s%> us.
